alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:07PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Robeson, northeastern Florence, Dillon, northeastern Darlington, northwestern Marion and southeastern Marlboro Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Brownsville, or 11 miles south of Bennettsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Latta, Sellers, Hamer, Brownsville, Oak Grove, Bingham, Little Rock, Minturn, South Of The Border, Dunbar, Blenheim and Mcleod Medical Center. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 173 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina.
